comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - use the attached report design
   - preview in web viewer (frameset url pattern)
   - got data exception from report design element (id: 42, 47, 51)

error log:

- Invalid expression to retrieve value in presentation.

note that this report uses mysql jdbc driver

This is a backward compatibility issue.

The attached report is converted using some unstable version of BIRT, the xml report design file is actually broken. User can fix the report in designer by mouse right click the data set to refresh the data set.

Mark the bug as won't fix.

traces.message: Invalid expression to retrieve value in presentation.
